name: MR.E!!!
greetingText: You know right, that I really love you a lot!
wishText: Always have a smile on your cute face ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Words can't express how much you mean to me. You're my light, my joy, my everything. Today, on your special day, I want to celebrate the incredible person you are and all the love and happiness you bring into my life.
replayText: You make me laugh, you make me think, you make me feel like the luckiest woman in the world.
outroSmiley: I love you more than words can say. Happy birthday, my love!  :)
